Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius). Grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan.
Combine softened butter and sugar in a large bowl and mix until light and fluffy. Add eggs one at a time, followed by rum, flour, and cornstarch. Pour the mixture into the greased loaf pan.
Bake in the oven for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Let it cool for at least 10 minutes before removing from the pan.

Prepare the glaze by combining the lemon juice and confectioners' sugar. Once the cake is out of the oven, poke holes all over using a fork or knitting needle. Drizzle the glaze on top, allowing it to soak in. Slice and serve.
